name: Dude Simulator 5
detailed_description: Dude Simulator 5 is an open world sandbox game. The scene of the game is a little town in wintertime. You’ve been driving your car and didn’t notice that you’d run out of gas. Your task is to buy a can of gas, fill up your tank, and continue driving. But you only have 5 dollars on you. You may either solve your problem as soon as you can and leave the town or stay there for a while. In this game, you can explore the town, find money and spend it on something, enter any building, buy something, play some jokes on those around you – so you can do just whatever you might wish in real life. It’s all up to you.

short_description: Dude Simulator 5 is an open world sandbox game. The scene of the game is a little town in wintertime. You’ve been driving your car and didn’t notice that you’d run out of gas. Your task is to buy a can of gas, fill up your tank, and continue driving.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP, 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 550
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows XP, 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 970
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
